products.title: Woven Moon Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Woven moon roller blind.

products.title: Amor Ironmonger With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor ironmonger with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor ironmonger and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

products.title: Amor Pure With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor pure and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Amor Midnight With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor midnight and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Kolsva, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: Mixing practicality and style, the kolsva sheesham contains superior, basswood timber sustainably sourced from conservational forests. The quality crafted louvres, in a sophisticated walnut shade, sit on adjustable mechanisms that allow you to alter the angle of the blind for all of your privacy, ventilation, and shading preferences. Create an elegant dcor scheme in your lounge by resting the sheesham against lavishly textured wallpaper with cocoa hues and delicate detailing.

products.title: Kolsva, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Adorn your windows in superior, basswood timber with the kolsva wengi, using sustainably sourced wood from conservational forests. Featuring craftsman-built louvres and modern components to allow you to regulate the room with your shading and privacy likings, this stylish window dressing provides character and vogue. Use the deep shade of the wengi to create a compelling scheme in your lounge, with similarly toned wooden features and a contrasting ivory and burgundy palette.

products.title: Kolsva, Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an elegant window covering with value, choose the kolsva tawny oak with its high quality standard and sustainably sourced timber. The authentic louvres and modern components allow you to create a sophisticated style, with the added practicality of ventilation and shading flexibilities. Fashion a vibrant and inspired tribal theme in your lounge by hanging the tawny oak against a burnt orange backing, with opposing cream.

products.title: Kolsva, Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you prefer an authentic window dressing with traditional style and practicality, choose the kolsva sycamore for its sustainably sourced timber and quality standard. Presenting naturally toned basswood louvres, that are quick and easy to install, with modern components, it allows you to adapt it to your privacy and shading preferences. For an elegant dcor scheme with a restful feel, use the sycamore in your bathroom to take advantage of its anti-cracking and anti-warping quality.

products.title: Kolsva, Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kolsva pale oak brings a touch of the natural world inside your home in a truly timeless way. With the gentle ebb and flow of the grain set against a warm and cosy shade you'll be able to sit back and relax as you appreciate the finer things in life. Turning the guest bedroom into the home away from home that your guests will never want to leave is all about adding those homely touches that put them at ease.

products.title: Cotswold, Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: The deep cream of the capri (blackout) code serves to provide a shimmering neutral backdrop to other, more attention-grabbing dcor. Its gentle, wispy curves are barely visible, catching you by surprise as the light hits them. This pretty pale beige will work well in any room of the house, due to its fantastic flexibility. Try it in the kitchen, where its wipe-clean surface will come in handy, and blend with mocha browns, dusky blues, or stark whites, depending on the mood you're looking for.

products.title: Affinity, Plaster - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's plaster is warm and welcoming, and creates a homely, classic feel in any room, whilst maintaining a feeling of contemporary, modern-day style. Its louvre's tilting mechanism is simple and easy to use, so that can let light in or keep it out as you see fit. The plaster will sit pretty amidst dark browns and medium woods, whether in the living room, bedroom, hallway, or anywhere else you would like a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The delicate silver curve pattern of the capri (blackout) pure tempers the bright white that lies beneath, and catches the light at every turn. Adjust the louvres to control the light to your liking, and enjoy this practical yet visually pleasing vertical blind. By hanging in the kitchen, you get attractive simplicity combined with wipe-clean practicality, as well as a blank canvas against which to sit the rest of your dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Vertical Blind
products.description: The gorgeously rich hue of the palermo (blackout) in burgundy adds a boldness to a room without compromising on classic, traditional style. Allow the light in whilst maintaining an element of privacy by gently tilting the adjustable louvres to your liking. Make the burgundy stand out in the living room by placing it against white or cream walls, and using matching burgundy accents throughout the room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerulean - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty duskiness of the palermo (blackout) in cerulean is a shade of blue that isn't to be missed, and when combined with the smooth, textured practicality of its lightly textured fabric, this blind becomes simply irresistible. Settle the cerulean amongst pale greys and whites, for a clean and attractive look in the kitchen, dining room, or living room. Accent with silver picture frames and ornaments, and don't forget to match your fixtures and fittings for maximum impact - you certainly won't regret the extra effort.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Chiffon - Vertical Blind
products.description: The capri (blackout) in chiffon offers a rich cream backdrop to delicately glistening curves, all on a durable, wipe-clean purposes, for when practicality is just as important as looks. Adjust the louvres for flexible light control, or draw back altogether as required. Use the chiffon in the kitchen amongst soft cappuccinos and pretty creams, or hang in the home office where you can pair with duck egg blues and cream soft furnishings, for a relaxing work environment that you won't want to leave.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Rocket - Vertical Blind
products.description: A deep brick red hue and discreet raised patterning come together in the sarra (blackout) rocket to create a modern and stylish blackout blind. Loud and proud, this is a powerful blackout blind that sets itself apart from its surrounding dcor. Sit the rocket amongst bright whites to create an unusual and eye-catching colour scheme in the bathroom, or use in a child's bedroom or playroom to add fun and colour to the mix.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Whisper - Vertical Blind
products.description: The creamy, off-white rapture (blackout) in whisper blends a soft, subtle background with a gently shimmering pattern that sits naturally over the top. Adjust how much light enters your room by controlling the louvres to your liking, and never be left in the dark - or light - again. A neat addition to a light-coloured utility room or downstairs cloakroom, where space enhancement is a must, the whisper will hang perfectly in your window.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Cream coloured, with a gently textured satin finish, the palermo (blackout) cameo is a neutral blind that will fit almost anywhere in your home. Adjustable louvres are used to control the light, which will bounce off the blind's gentle sheen and reflect into your room. Go for gold in the living room by teaming the cameo with brushed gold metallics and soft cappuccino shades, resulting in calming, luxurious atmosphere that neither you and your family nor your guests will be able to resist.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Icecap - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a pure white, finely textured blind, with excellent blackout properties, so that you can keep the light and heat out as and when you need to. The brightness of the white offers a stark contrast to almost any shade, adding a refreshing cleanness wherever it's hung. For a crisp, clean home office, pair the icecap with bright limes and yellows to create a lively, eye-catching colour scheme, or with pale pastel blues or pinks for a calming serenity that's sure to help you concentrate.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Midnight - Vertical Blind
products.description: It's all in the name; the palermo (blackout) in midnight is a deep, night-time blue that provides a dark, mysterious atmosphere. The adjustable louvres can be moved or tilted to allow light in without compromising entirely on privacy. The kids will love this the midnight as a dark backdrop to a bedroom filled with glow-in-the dark stars and space-themed wallpaper, but the grown-ups will appreciate it just as much in a navy, white, and red kitchen or dining room, complemented by silvers or golds.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Sky - Vertical Blind
products.description: The gorgeously bold hue of the palermo (blackout) sky can't be missed, and you'll love the cheerful splash of colour that it brings to your home. Don't worry though, you can still see the outside sky whenever you like, by simply adjusting the louvres to tilt them or move them aside. Team the sky with bright white walls for a fresh, clean, and energetic feel in the family bathroom, or perhaps use in the playroom to match colourful wallpapers and fun fabrics.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Gossip - Vertical Blind
products.description: Bright, cheery, and uplifting, the sarra (blackout) gossip is a lively apple green fabric, with raised texturing to add depth and catch the eye. The gossip is an effective blackout blind, using the most up-to-date technology, and has a high quality, glistening finish. Go for a fruity colour scheme to liven up an all-white bathroom, by combining the gossip with hints of orange and lemon, to give an uplifting zest during your morning routine.

products.title: Zambezi Taped Cloud Real Wood
products.description: Their premium taped zambezi painted cloud real wood blind features a soft grey painted finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this grey wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. Add a touch of luxury with complimentary lunar tape.

products.title: Amazon Taped Acacia Real Wood
products.description: Their premium amazon taped acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. This blind is finished with a luxury tape to complete the look. Product id: sdb-wsb0778 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: dove light filtering: yes amazon taped acacia real wood in grey.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.
